c:complexType.name: BarChart
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the Bar chart.
For information on the supported data formats see .

c:property.name: bar
c:property.c:documentation: The bar plot is the main plot of the bar chart, which means that its properties may be used without the "bar" property suffix.

c:complexType.name: BarPlot
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Bar plot.

c:property.name: trend
c:property.c:documentation:
Contains the plot's trending options.
Besides the property concatenation way of specifying this property and its sub-properties, this option may also be specified as a plain JSON object.
